scripts.dev: npm run build:electron && npm run build:relay && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm:dev:renderer" "npm:dev:electron" "npm:dev:relay" "npm:dev:app"
scripts.dev:dual: npm run build:electron && npm run build:relay && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm:dev:renderer" "npm:dev:electron" "npm:dev:relay" "npm:dev:app:instance-a" "npm:dev:app:instance-b"
scripts.dev:triple: npm run build:electron && npm run build:relay && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm:dev:renderer" "npm:dev:electron" "npm:dev:relay" "npm:dev:app:instance-a" "npm:dev:app:instance-b" "npm:dev:app:instance-c"
scripts.dev:app: wait-on tcp:5173 file:dist-electron/main.js file:dist-electron/preload.js && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist-electron/main.js
scripts.dev:app:instance-a: wait-on tcp:5173 file:dist-electron/main.js file:dist-electron/preload.js && cross-env LANTERN_INSTANCE=A LANTERN_DEBUG_DISCOVERY=1 VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist-electron/main.js
scripts.dev:app:instance-b: wait-on tcp:5173 file:dist-electron/main.js file:dist-electron/preload.js && cross-env LANTERN_INSTANCE=B LANTERN_DEBUG_DISCOVERY=1 VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist-electron/main.js
scripts.dev:app:instance-c: wait-on tcp:5173 file:dist-electron/main.js file:dist-electron/preload.js && cross-env LANTERN_INSTANCE=C LANTERN_DEBUG_DISCOVERY=1 VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist-electron/main.js
scripts.build: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:electron && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:win: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:electron && npm run build:dist:win
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:electron && npm run build:dist:mac
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:electron && npm run build:dist:linux
